text:
From: Kazara Aikaterini <akazara@eurobank.gr> 
Sent: Wednesday, July 3, 2024 10:03 AM
To: Nikolai Hadzhiysky <n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com>; Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>; Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com>
Cc: Palamidas Andreas <anpalamidas@eurobank.gr>; GCM (General Clearing Member) <GCM@eurobank.gr>; Sales and Relationship Management <SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr>
Subject: TIBIEL Ltd Νatural Gas Invoice - Clearing & Sub-Acc. Fees GAS - 06/2024

 

Dear all,

 

Attached you will find the invoice issued by Eurobank SA regarding:

 

The fees for the maintenance of Sub-Accounts at the Natural Gas Platform in June 2024.

 

We are at your disposal for any further clarification.

 

 

Kind regards,

 

Aikaterini Kazara

SENIOR SECURITIES & FUNDS ADMINISTRATOR 

General Member Clearing Services 

Group Investment Products Operations 

 



 

EUROBANK S.A.

Panagouli & Siniosoglou Str. (Building E)

GR 142 34 Nea Ionia, Athens Greece

Tel

Email  

 

: (+30) 21 4406 3242  

: GCM@eurobank.gr <mailto:gcm@eurobank.gr>           

 

 

 

 

 

 

* Think before you print.


Disclaimer:
This e-mail is confidential. If you are not the intended recipient, you should not copy it, re-transmit it, use it or disclose its contents, but should return it to the sender immediately and delete the copy from your system.
Eurobank S.A. is not responsible for, nor endorses, any opinion, recommendation, conclusion, solicitation, offer or agreement or any information contained in this communication.
Eurobank S.A. cannot accept any responsibility for the accuracy or completeness of this message as it has been transmitted over a public network. If you suspect that the message may have been intercepted or amended, please call the sender.
